metadata.title: Add Patient Billing Tab Integration for Related Invoices
metadata.prd_reference: Feature 3 Billing Tab + Feature 4 Invoice List

context.background: This task implements Add Patient Billing Tab Integration for Related Invoices for Healio and is scoped as one atomic work item aligned to the PRD. It should be completed within 30 mins and leave clear evidence for follow-on tasks.

design_constraints.constraint: Use Stripe-like frictionless workflows: create/edit actions should open centered modals or slide-out drawers instead of disruptive full-page forms.
Use a Viedoc-style bento layout: soft floating white cards on an off-white background for dashboards and dense data views.
Apply the Paper Replacement palette: app background near #F9FAFB, white cards, calm trustworthy accents (teal/sage/cerulean), and reserve red for critical alerts only.
Preserve high-legibility typography: clean sans-serif (Inter/SF Pro/Halyard), bold patient names, slate-gray secondary metadata.
Honor the one-click rule where applicable: keep the global + action for Add Appointment, Add Patient, and Create Invoice visible and easy to reach.
Add educational empty states with clear CTAs for first-time or empty datasets.

instruction.step: Implement the scoped changes for Add Patient Billing Tab Integration for Related Invoices in the planned files (healio/components/patients/patient-billing-tab.tsx, healio/app/(dashboard)/patients/[id]/page.tsx) while preserving the PRD-aligned project structure.
Apply validation, error handling, and consistent response/UI behavior so the task output integrates cleanly with existing helpers and patterns.
Wire integrations and dependencies for this task (endpoints: GET /api/v1/invoices?patientId=:id) and keep tenant scoping/RBAC/security expectations intact where applicable.
Prefer in-context modal/drawer workflows, scannable bento cards, and educational empty states so the UI matches the requested Healio experience.
Verify keyboard/focus behavior, touch target sizing, and mobile responsiveness before marking the task ready.

validation_checklist.check: Exercise the related endpoint(s): GET /api/v1/invoices?patientId=:id and verify response shape/status codes.
Run lint/typecheck or the smallest relevant test suite for the files changed by this task.
Manually verify desktop and mobile layouts plus focus/keyboard behavior for the primary interaction path.
Use Chrome DevTools MCP to verify the implemented UI in-browser (desktop + mobile), check interactions, inspect console errors, and capture a validation snapshot before marking done.
Capture a screenshot or short note confirming empty/loading/error states are present where applicable.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: The deliverable for Add Patient Billing Tab Integration for Related Invoices is implemented in the referenced files and compiles without breaking adjacent modules.
Task output matches the PRD scope (Feature 3 Billing Tab + Feature 4 Invoice List) and remains bounded to an atomic <=45-minute implementation chunk.
Related endpoint behavior returns the standard success/error envelope and respects auth/public route expectations for the route class.
UI states (loading, empty, error, success) are present and visually consistent with Healio bento cards, off-white background, and trust-oriented styling.
Interactions are keyboard accessible and usable on mobile without disruptive navigation when a modal/drawer workflow is appropriate.

execution_tracking.verification_command: npm run typecheck; Chrome DevTools MCP on http://localhost:4012/patients/:id (billing tab empty + invoice list states backed by GET /api/v1/invoices?patientId=:id)
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Added a patient-chart Billing tab and in-context billing card that queries related invoices via `GET /api/v1/invoices?patientId=:id`. The tab shows educational empty state, refresh action, status badges, balance summary, and a disabled Create Invoice CTA (explicitly deferred to billing dashboard tasks) while preserving the PRD's context-first workflow.

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, test commands, screenshots (UI tasks), and commit/PR references here.
Include Chrome DevTools MCP evidence (snapshot/screenshot reference and notes on responsive + interaction checks) here before marking frontend tasks complete.
Typecheck: `npm run typecheck` passed after adding Billing tab and invoice list integration.

Chrome DevTools MCP verification on `http://localhost:4012/patients/pat_0d410ad9-12f0-47ae-97a4-cb205177f559`: switched to the new Billing tab and confirmed the educational empty state (`No invoices yet`) with in-context refresh/create CTAs.

Chrome DevTools MCP API-backed list verification: created an invoice via in-page `fetch('/api/v1/invoices')` (`201`) for the patient, clicked `Refresh List`, and confirmed the Billing tab rendered `INV-2026-00001` with DRAFT status badge, due date, invoice id, total/paid amounts, and computed balance summary.
Chrome DevTools MCP responsive check: resized to mobile `390x844` and back to desktop `1280x900`; Billing tab content remained readable and mobile bottom navigation stayed visible.

Chrome DevTools MCP network checks (expected): GET `/api/v1/patients/:id` = 200; initial GET `/api/v1/invoices?patientId=:id` = 200; POST `/api/v1/invoices` = 201; refetch GET `/api/v1/invoices?patientId=:id` = 200.
Chrome DevTools MCP console check: only expected React DevTools informational message; no application errors during billing tab verification.
Implementation commit: f617a73 (feat(healio-patients): patient billing tab ui).
